abstract: The New York Times announces deputy national editor James Dao will become Op-Ed editor.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Dao is deputy national editor, and reported on the 2000 presidential campaign and the military.

headline.main: James Dao to Become New York Times’s Op-Ed Editor
headline.print_headline: Times Names James Dao Editor of the Op-Ed Page

snippet: Mr. Dao is deputy national editor, and reported on the 2000 presidential campaign and the military.
